github.copilot.chat.reviewSelection.inst.text: Prioritize correctness, security, and TypeScript types. Flag unsafe SQL, secret leakage, and missing error handling. Skip minor style nits unless risky.

github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use Conventional Commits. Format: <type>(<scope>): <subject>. Types: feat, fix, refactor, docs, test, build, chore. Subject in imperative mood.
Wrap body at ~72 chars; include WHY and notable trade-offs. Reference issues with #<id> when applicable.

github.copilot.chat.pullRequestDescripti.text: Include summary, key changes, risk/impact, testing steps, and rollback plan. Use bullet lists. Link related issues.
